summary: A Group of teenagers test the legend of an immortal witch and get more than they bargained for.
cast: Devon Werkheiser|Justin Deeley|Jess Adams|Jamie Kaler|Caitlin Carmichael|Diana Hopper|Jackelyn Gauci|Chase Yi|Robert Young|Cassie Keller|Nicole Forester|Carlos Faison|Greg Collins|Paula Tutman|Ian Samuel Young|Lena Drake|Celeste Risko
title: The Wicked
